blogPost.excerpt: www.viviparty.com is a space for virtual events. Move freely from room to room and meet one-on-one or in groups. Design your own room, invite friends and set privacy. View a slideshow or play a game. Lots of fun features! Need your ideas and feedback!
blogPost.body: www.viviparty.com is a space for virtual events. Move freely from room to room and meet one-on-one or in groups. Design your own room, invite friends and set privacy. View a slideshow or play a game. Lots of fun features! Need your ideas and feedback!
blogPost.title: ViVi - Take the Zoom cocktail hour to the next level
blogPost.author: John Moran

localize.description: www.viviparty.com 是一个虚拟活动的空间。在房间与房间之间自由移动，一对一或团体见面。设计您自己的房间，邀请朋友并设置隐私。观看幻灯片或玩游戏。很多有趣的功能! 需要你的想法和反馈!
localize.tagline: 让Zoom鸡尾酒会更上一层楼。

localize.description: www.viviparty.com 是一個虛擬活動的空間。在房間與房間之間自由移動，一對一或團體見面。設計您自己的房間，邀請朋友並設置隱私。觀看幻燈片或玩遊戲。很多有趣的功能! 需要你的想法和反饋!
localize.tagline: 讓Zoom雞尾酒會更上一層樓。

next.excerpt: About BebeSleep - Free offering of some 60 different pieces of white noise for your baby to enter into sleep - Premium sound sources to restore your baby's healthy sleep pattern - Soundscape from around the globe to develop your baby's hearing ability
next.title: BebeSleep - BebeSleep is dedicated to helping your baby sleep

localize.description: 关于BebeSleep - 免费提供约60种不同的白噪音，让宝宝进入睡眠状态 - 高级音源，恢复宝宝健康的睡眠模式 - 来自全球各地的音景，开发宝宝的听觉能力。
localize.tagline: BebeSleep致力于帮助您的宝宝睡眠。

localize.description: 關於BebeSleep - 免費提供約60種不同的白噪音，讓寶寶進入睡眠狀態 - 高級音源，恢復寶寶健康的睡眠模式 - 來自全球各地的音景，開發寶寶的聽覺能力。
localize.tagline: BebeSleep致力於幫助您的寶寶睡眠。
